attributes.additional_details:
All immigrants to the UK must have an hourly rate of a minimum of five times the national minimum hourly wage. This should apply to all full time work.
To prevent fraud, ie. immigrants coming in to work
'one hour a week',  no immigrant to be allowed to
work part time.
This would ensure fully qualified well paid immigrants
can enter, and low paid British people can come
off benefits where appropriate by keeping out low
paid labour.
